text: @SpeakerPelosi US have tested less than 17,000 for Coronavirus, while South Korea, a country with 1/6th the population has tested over 248,000 The former director of the CDC is calling for an investigation into coronavirus testing failures: 'Something went wrong' https://t.co/pZjgPdj51Y
